title: Garter Stitch
description: One of the first stitches any knitters learns, garter stitch involves row after row of simple knit stitches.
subject: knits and purls, simple patterns

title: Stockinette Stitch
description: Stockinette is a simple stitch for any knitter. To create a fabric with stockinette stitch, one has to alternate rows of knit and purl stitches.
subject: knits and purls, simple patterns

title: Moss Stitch
description: Seed stitch is a pretty, simple stitch that comes from alternating knit and purl stitches, it uses a two row repeat to create the stitch texture.
subject: knits and purls

title: Double Moss Stitch
description: Incredibly similar to seed stitch, double seed stitch simply has another knit or purl added to each repeat, making the pattern slightly extended. It also relies on a four row repeat rather than a two row repeat.
subject: knits and purls

title: Basketweave Stitch
description: Basketweave stitch uses knit and purl stitches to create a patern similar to a woven basket.
patterninstructions:
Cast on multiple of 8 sts + 4. 
Row 1 (Wrong side): p2 *k6, p2, rep from * to end. 
Row 2: k2, â€œp6, k2, rep from * to end.
Row 3: p2 *k6, p2, rep from * to end.
Row 4: k all stitches. 
Row 5: k4, p2, *k6, p2, rep from * to last 4 sts, k4.
Row 6: p4, k2, *p6, k2, rep from * to last 4 sts, p4.
Row 7: k4, p2, *k6, p2, rep from * to last 4 sts, k4.
Row 8: k all stitches.  
Repeat rows 1-8 until you have reached your desired length.
subject: knits and purls

title: Dandelion Flowers
description: Dandelion Stitch is a beautiful decorative design that displays simple flowers on a stockinette background. It can be tricky to start off with for a beginner due to some of the actions necessary, but once you get the hang of it can go fairly quickly.
subject: floral knitting

title: Daisy Stitch
description: Daisy stitch (or star stitch) is a beautiful floral pattern created by a four row repeat. Creating the pattern with two colors instead of one can really make it pop! Because it's so squishy, it is perfect for scarves, sweaters, and blankets.
subject: floral knitting

title: Cornflower Stitch
description: Basketweave stitch uses knit and purl stitches to create a patern similar to a woven basket.
subject: floral knitting

title: Bamboo Stitch
description: Bamboo stitch is a fairly simple knit and purl rib pattern that resembles stalks of bamboo. It can be used for a variety of projects, but it is important to note that it is not reversible!
subject: ribbed knitting

title: Ginko Leaf
description: Ginko leaf is a pretty lace stitch that resembles ginko leaves. Though it can be tricky, it isn't a bad pattern to attempt for a knitter interested in starting with lace.
subject: knitted lace

title: Waves
description: The wave stitch is a very pretty pattern that while looks difficult to master, can actually be a simple lace stitch. It is perfect for scarves and shawls.
subject: knitted lace

title: Diagonal Lace
description: Diagonal lace stitch is a pretty and somewhat easy lace stitch. It can be a beautiful pattern for scarves in fingering weight yarn.
patterninstructions:
Cast on multiple of 8 sts + 4.
Row 1 (Right side): k2, *yo, sl 1, k1, psso, k1, k2tog, yo, k3, rep from * to last 2 sts, k2. Row 2: p7, *p2tog tbl, yo, p6; rep from * to last 5 sts, p2tog tbl, yo, p3. Row 3: k4, *yo, sl 1, k1, psso, k1, k2tog, yo, k3; rep from * to end. Row 4: p5, *p2tog tbl, yo, p6; rep from * to last 7 sts, p2tog tbl, yo, p5. Row 5: k1, *k2tog, yo, k3, yo, sl 1, k1, psso, k1; rep from * to last 3 sts, k2tog, yo, k1. Row 6: p3, *p2tog tbl, yo, p6; rep from * to last st, p1. Row 7: k3, *k2tog, yo, k3, yo, sl 1, k1, psso, k1; rep from * to last st, k1. Row 8: p1, *p2tog tbl, yo, p6; rep from * to last 3 sts ,p2tog tbl, yo, p1. Repeat rows 1-8 until you have reached your desired length.
subject: knitted lace
